abstract: Most of us don't give much thought to seasonal changes and skin, but for Annee de Mamiel, there's no separating the two.
snippet: Most of us don't give much thought to seasonal changes and skin, but for Annee de Mamiel, there's no separating the two.
lead_paragraph: Apart from switching to a richer moisturizer during the winter, most of us do not give much thought to seasonal changes and skin. But for Annee de Mamiel, there is no separating the two. Combining her training in traditional Chinese medicine, which holds that everything is seasonal, and her experience as a facialist, de Mamiel creates four limited-edition custom oils every year, each one available only during the three-month period for which it is intended.
